# Digital Routine - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A production-ready daily routine tracking SaaS application with discipline analytics.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Backend: Next.js API Routes
- Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- TypeScript

## Architecture Decisions
- **Backend**: Using Next.js API routes for simplicity and serverless deployment
- **Database**: PostgreSQL for structured relational data, ACID compliance, and complex analytics queries
